sentences.sentence: We're goin 'to Europe! -give me some metacarpal love!
sentences.translation: 我们要去欧洲了！ -给我一些掌骨的爱！

sentences.sentence: The correlations between the length of the second metacarpal and the body height of male is best.
sentences.translation: 其中女性第三掌骨长与身高的相关性最好，男性第二掌骨长与身高相关性最好。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To summarize the treatment effect of applied external micro fixator on metacarpal and phalangeal fractures.
sentences.translation: 目的总结应用微型外固定架方式治疗掌指骨骨折的临床效果。
